name: Plastic Planet
description:
What if people ignored the trash problems, and kept throwing their trash in the ocean? This game is based on that question. In this game, you will try to clean the ocean from trash, with your hook. Upgrade your raft and gear to make the cleaning more effective.

Good luck cleaning the ocean!

Early access:

The game is still in early access. There is a lot of content that will be added, and a lot of things will be changed. Currently, there is no saved data, the option will be added very soon.
